title: Ningyo no Mori
synopsis: It is said that consuming the flesh of a mermaid confers immortality. This certainly proved to be the case for the 500-year-old Yuta and his friend Mana.  However, most people who try to become immortal either die or transform into monsters.
related_anime: ['Ningyo Series', 'Takahashi Rumiko Gekijou Ningyo no Mori', "Mermaid's Scar"]
